titleStmt.title: The life of St. Anthony of Padoua With the miracles he wrought both before, and after his death. Written originally in Italian, and now done into English.

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum privilegio.
In two parts; "The second book, of the miracles on St. Anthony of Padoua" has caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
